moving

Class TreasureChest

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.TreasureChest

  • public class TreasureChest
extends java.lang.Object
    A treasure chest. It contains items that will be released to the map once the chest is opened.

    • Field Summary

      double grav 
      java.awt.Image img

      Makes the treasure chest opened.
      void updatePosition(Game myGame)
      Updates the treasure chest's position on the map and checks for collision.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TreasureChest

        public TreasureChest(int xOnMap,
             int yOnMap,
             java.awt.Image img,
             Item[] items)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        xOnMap - The x-position of the treasure chest.
        yOnMap - The y-position of the treasure chest.
        img - The treasure chest's image.
        items - An array of items that the chest can drop.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition(Game myGame)
        Updates the treasure chest's position on the map and checks for collision.
        Parameters:
        myGame - A copy of the current Game.

      • makeOpened

        public void makeOpened()
        Makes the treasure chest opened.

      • exportTC

        public java.lang.String exportTC()
        Fetches a String that represents the treasure chest, to be exported to a map file.
        Returns:
        A String that represents this treasure chest's data.
